import React from 'react'; import {Link,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Forgot=()=>{ const [email,setemail]=useState('') let userdata={ email } const linksent=()=>{ axios.post('https://localhost/4444/Forgot',userdata).then(response=>{ }) } return(
